text:
Hi everyone,
Is it possible to use a post ID to pull content directly from another page in HubSpot? For example, I have case study pages from which I need to extract specific content to display in a carousel on the homepage. Thanks in advance! :blush:

Is no `.woff2` support a bug? I get this error when dragging `.woff2` in the font’s upload region and the `.woff2` files are greyed out on the upload file dialog.

<https://caniuse.com/woff2|it has 97.47% support> and is far faster/superior. So this has me thinking it might be overlooked?
are you optimizing the pngs? sometimes i’ll overoptimize and run into this problem. I usually stick with jpgs anyways
Does this work with bringing content from modules used on that page?
as long as you pass in a valid id you should be good to go
I for the longest time didn't know you can use jpg(because of my jpg not uploading originally because of restraints)... sounds like there's a file size limit, I'm going to do some testing.
There don't seem to be any size or dimension constraints (I uploaded a 1.37 MB 4080x2302 JPG). I'll come back if I run into this issue again; maybe it was just a fluke.
